1.content: are you a guy or a gal
1.title: It begins!!!!?

11.content: "Shit!" you yell running down the hallway towards your room"they're coming!" behind you, you here a bunch of footsteps, and a terrifying moan."open the doors!"your freind amber yells, banging on the doors.then, you see the first one up the staircase. it would have been about your age(15) but it was dead, flesh falling out of its heavily mutalated face just as more appear, the door opens and you and amber rush in. "Shit John, what took you so long?"you ask as John slams the door shut and starts locking the door."it's gary," he says as you help Amber of the ground," he's trying to get out." what!!" you and amber scream, rushing into the small living room of Gary's apartment Jason and Shelby are at the door, trying To Hold Back Emily, gary's girlfreind. you and amber rush onto the balcony, just in time to see gary hit the groun. he gets of his home made rope, and then get grabbed by 2 z's and ripped apart.
11.title: the Runaway

choices: a huge hole in the concrete floor that led to an underground passage way.
a massive mound of chopped up zombie parts.
12.content: I felt my eyes start to water as we hid in a nearby abandoned building. I couldn't take it any more. Almost every one I have ever known or loved has fallen victom to this disease. All I have left are Dan, Haily,and Jaden, my closest friends. "Tiff, its gonna be ok." Dan said as he embraced me. "I'm going to get all of us out of this safely. I promise." I sobbed in the comfort of his polo shirt for a few minutes before pulling away from him as I heard foot steps come from behind us. Quickly, I wipped away my tears and faced whoever it was who just came in. It was Haily and Jaden. "Hey guys! Come look at this!" Haily exclaimed, motioning for us to follow her and Jaden. Obediantly, we followed them down stairs to see what they wanted to show us. When we reached the end of the staircase, we saw...
12.title: female

choices: a pack of equally frightened survivors
a dozen military workers to the rescue. SAVED!
123.content:
"Wow!" Dan exclaimed in happiness, quickly running toward a vending machine and kicking in the glass barrier designed to keep the snacks from being stolen. "I know, right!" Haily replied, greedily shoving past Dan and yanking a bag of potato crisps from the machine. "Guys, I don't feel right about this..." I said warily, cautiously sidestepping shards of broken glass. "You hafta...relax...girl!" Jaden said between bites of chocolate chunk cookies. "Yea, relax, it's not like we'll get busted for this. There's no police left in the city..." said Dan. "Well, yea I know, but-" Hailey angrily cut her off, "But WHAT, Tiffany?!" She stood up, with noticed force, and rolled her eyes. "What's the problem? Just eat the damn food!"
The staircase was eerily silent for a moment and suddenly, Jaden scolded Hailey, "SHUTUP! Stop speaking so loudly, they," she jeked her head up the stairs motioning toward the front door," might hear you!" All was silent except for the constant chewing of Dan's mouth against the chips. A noise suddenly emerged from the dark depths of the passageway beyond the base of the stairs. "What was THAT?" Hailey said with much fear in her voice. Suddenly, doors are heard in the distance and running, as well. Faces emerge from the shadows as Hailey and Jaiden scream. It's-
123.title: several vending machines.

info.brief_description: a new virus has been relased turning americans into zombies
info.description:
In early 2009, an experimental virus was relased in Echo City, a large city 2 hours north of New York City. You and your freinds have managed to survive 3 months in the hell hole, but now you have to get out of there the rules are as followed


You cant have more then 20 people in your group
no sex
no short stupid chapters(they will be deleted)
and one last thing, if you make a character say an ironic statement, i will make them die, so try not to do that
